ideas.title: Install Solar Street Lights in Market Area
ideas.description: The market area lacks proper lighting at night, making it unsafe for traders and customers. Installing solar-powered street lights would significantly improve security, extend trading hours, and create a safer environment for the community. The lights would be maintenance-free and environmentally friendly.

ideas.title: Community Computer Training Center
ideas.description: Establish a dedicated computer training center in the constituency to teach digital skills to youth and adults. Many residents lack basic computer knowledge and digital literacy skills, which are essential for employment and modern communication. The center would offer courses in basic computing, internet usage, and professional software applications.
ideas.admin_notes: Approved for implementation in Q2 2025. Budget allocated from constituency development fund. Partnership with local tech companies secured.

ideas.title: Mobile Health Clinic for Remote Villages
ideas.description: A mobile health clinic that visits remote villages on a weekly schedule would greatly improve healthcare access for residents who cannot travel to the main hospital. The clinic would provide basic medical services, health screenings, vaccinations, and health education. This would address the healthcare gap in underserved communities.

ideas.title: Youth Sports Tournament
ideas.description: Organize annual inter-community sports tournaments for youth to promote healthy living, community bonding, and talent development. The tournaments would include football, basketball, and athletics, bringing together young people from different communities and fostering positive relationships.
ideas.admin_notes: Successfully implemented in December 2024. Great turnout with 200+ participants! First annual tournament completed. Planning for 2025 edition already underway.

ideas.title: School Feeding Program Enhancement
ideas.description: Enhance the existing school feeding program by incorporating locally sourced, nutritious foods and expanding coverage to more schools. This would improve child nutrition, school attendance rates, and support local farmers by creating demand for their produce.

ideas.title: Community Waste Management System
ideas.description: Implement a comprehensive waste management system with regular collection, recycling centers, and community education on waste reduction. This would improve environmental cleanliness, reduce disease vectors, and create employment opportunities in waste collection and recycling.
ideas.admin_notes: Approved for pilot implementation in 3 communities. Environmental assessment completed. Partnership with waste management company secured.

ideas.title: Digital Skills Training for Women
ideas.description: Provide specialized digital skills training programs targeted at women in the constituency. Focus on practical skills like online business management, digital marketing, and e-commerce platforms to empower women economically and bridge the digital gender gap.

ideas.title: Road Infrastructure Improvement
ideas.description: Improve road infrastructure in high-traffic areas with proper drainage, street lighting, and pedestrian walkways. Focus on the main commercial district and school routes to enhance safety and economic activity.
